title.rendered: University of Arizona International Scholarships for Students in USA, 2023

content.rendered:
The University of Arizona is happy to offer International Scholarships to students. These scholarships can provide funding of $4,000 to $35,000 per year for freshmen and $5,000 per year for transfer students. This app is for students who are really good at school work.

This article does not include information for students who are not pursuing a degree, studying abroad, or who have been conditionally admitted. A few students may receive merit-based scholarships for the fall of 2023.

Know about the University of Arizona

The University of Arizona (UA) is a public university in Tucson, Arizona. It was started in 1885. This is the first college in the Arizona Territory.

The university works closely with two medical centers. One is in Tucson and the other is in Phoenix.

The University of Arizona is controlled by the Arizona Board of Regents. The University of Arizona is chosen to be a member of the Association of American Universities, which is a group of the top research institutions in North America. This person is the only one from Arizona in this group.

The cost of attending school full-time is $12,400 for residents and $36,400 for non-residents.

Rogers College of Law. Rogers Law College.

It provides various types of degrees including undergraduate, postgraduate, doctoral, and professional degrees. The people who work at this place are well respected around the world for being leaders, knowledgeable in their field, and helpful in their community. They are recognized by famous academic societies and programs.

Scholarship Level/Field

The University of Arizona International Scholarships is available for freshmen and undergraduates who wish to obtain degrees in any undergraduate courses in any field of study at the University.

Host Nationality

The Scholarship is based in the United States and takes place at the University of Arizona, as well as at partner institutions around the world.

If you are a student from another country and you want to study in the United States, look into the top scholarships available for studying there.

Eligible Nationality

The University of Arizona scholarship is available for international students from every nation worldwide.

Scholarship Worth

The scholarship offers tuition and financial support of $4,000 — $35,000 per academic year for $5,000 per academic year for transport students.

Scholarship Number

The number of offers was not specified. However, Multiple scholarships can be obtained.

Eligibility for Scholarship

Applicants for the scholarship must fulfill the following requirements

  • Candidates must verify their lawful presence as described under Arizona’s Proposition 300.
    Semesters without lawful presence verified will be lost and counted against the scholarship’s eight semesters.
  • Awards are for undergraduate studies only.
  • Scholarship recipients must accept their award by paying their enrollment fee by May 1 for freshmen and by June 1 for transfer students.
  • Non-degree-seeking, exchange, and conditionally admitted students are not eligible.

Before you apply, you will need to have the following supporting documentation ready:

  • Students selected for this scholarship will receive a notification by email and a letter in their admissions packet.
  • Offers are non-negotiable and are not increased to match offers from other institutions.
  • The award must be used in the semester for which it was first offered.
  • Awards are not offered for spring or summer terms.

How To Apply

The International Tuition Award is a scholarship that is offered every year to many students at UA. It is highly competitive and available for both undergraduate and graduate students.

Please make sure to send in your complete application and all the required documents by december 1, for the Fall 2023 semester.
Records submitted after April 1 will not be used to determine eligibility for scholarships.

Application Deadline

The deadline for an application for the scholarship is December 1st 2023.

You can commence the application by clicking on the scholarship Link
